title: User authentication
content: Using Firebase, users can register or login/logout of their account.

title: Mobile-friendly design
content: Responsive layout using Bootstrap to provide a seamless experience across devices.

title: Shopping cart
content: Users can add/remove items from their shopping cart or continue on to Checkout.

title: Checkout & Payment
content: Users can proceed to a checkout page and can enter their payment details.

title: Order History
content: Users can view their order history by quering the Apollo GraphQL server.

title: Testimonials & Promotions
content: Homepage has dynamically changing Testimonials & Promotions.
